jobDescription: Information Resources, Inc. (IRI) seeks Strategic Analytics  Consultants for Chicago, IL to build, enhance & translate analytic & statistical solutions for clients in CPG industry. Masters in Statistics/Analytics +2yrs exp or Bachelors in Statistics/Analytics +5yrs exp reqd. Skills Reqd: Machine Learning  (Regression, Classification), Hadoop, Hive, HBase, MySQL; Toolkits (Scikit-learn, NumPy, Scipy, Pandas), Tableau, Linux/Unix, data mining with large (>1GB/1M  records) data sets; SAS, R, SQL. Send resume to: Angelika Kress, REF#VG, 150 N. Clinton Street. Chicago, IL 60661
